name: Darkphobia DEMO
description:
There isn't really much story to this yet. You start as a wandering spirit, and you have 5-character choices to pick from. All classes have their own strengths and weaknesses. Battles are random and there are small quests you can do around the game. There are currently 5 secrets in this game to find.

Send donations through CashApp: TyrakeOccu1t
